argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpinvid.1 | |- U = ( GId ` G ) |
| 2 |  | grpinvid.2 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ran G = ran G |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_grpoidcl | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> U e. ran G ) |
| 5 | 3, 1 | #P_grpolid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ U e. ran G ) -> ( U G U ) = U ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mpdan | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( U G U ) = U ) |
| 7 | 3, 1, 2 | #P_grpoinvid1 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ U e. ran G /\ U e. ran G ) -> ( ( N ` U ) = U <-> ( U G U ) = U ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 4, 7 | #P_mpd3an23 | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( ( N ` U ) = U <-> ( U G U ) = U ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_mpbird | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( N ` U ) = U ) |
